job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Some of the characteristics the manager is looking for in a contractor for this role areltbrgtltulgtltligt Knowledge and experience in building and analyzing linear regression logistic regression generalized linear models and time series modelsltligtltligt Experience in converting business problems into statistical problems building models to solve the statistical problem then use the models to develop business recommendations to solve the business problemltligtltligt Knowledge of optimization techniques and application to business problemsltligtltligt Experience in pulling data from multiple sources cleaning the data and preparing the data for analysisltligtltligt Experience in using a structure workflow in their problem solvingltligtltligt Experience in using Git to manage model versionsltligtltligt Experience with R and Pythonltligtltligt 3 years of applying the above in a business environmentltbrgtltligtltulgtltbrgtltbrgt
